headline: James Altucher: Soaring Internet Costs and Failing Networks Make Starlink “A Godsend for Consumers”
summary: Altucher Points to Rising Prices, Slower Speeds, and Industry Failures as Starlink’s Rapid Expansion Crosses Six Million UsersWashington, D.C., Nov. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Technology analyst and bestselling author James Altucher says America’s internet crisis has reached a breaking point — and that Starlink is emerging as the clearest alternative for millions of frustrated users around the world. headline: Metronet Fiber Now Reaches Three Million Locations – A First Among Dedicated Fiber Providers
summary: EVANSVILLE, Ind., November 24, 2025--Metronet announced today that it has expanded its 100% fiber-optic network to three million homes and businesses – a first among dedicated fiber providers and a milestone in the two-decade shift toward faster, more reliable all-fiber connectivity across the U.S.
